card.title: The Perfect Setting
card.paragraph1: Imagine celebrating love surrounded by lush nature, reflected in the calm waters of a lake gilded by the sunset. Buriti Lake is the ideal setting for those who dream of a charming outdoor wedding, where every detail harmonizes with the beauty of the environment.
card.paragraph2: With its stunning landscaping, architecture integrated with nature and impeccable structure, the space offers the perfect balance between elegance and serenity. At every moment, the setting transforms into a living painting â€” the perfect moment to say 'I do'.
card.paragraph3: With the support of Leco Biagioni's office, every element gains purpose: from the altar to the decoration, everything is planned to create a unique, romantic and unforgettable experience.
card.paragraph4: Live your big day in one of the most charming places in Rio de Janeiro and immortalize your story with the glow of the sun setting over Buriti Lake.

about.title: About Us

about.description: Our advisory and ceremonial team, led by Leco Biagioni, is here to transform your wedding into a unique and unforgettable experience. With years of experience and an eye for detail, we ensure that every moment is perfect. Leco Biagioni works with the best suppliers in the market, and the couple will have their advisory from start to finish.
